roadroller.gameobject.powerups
Interface IPowerUp

All Superinterfaces:
GameObject
All Known Implementing Classes:
FuelDrain, FuelUp, SlowDown, SpeedUp
public interface IPowerUp
extends GameObject

Interface for Powerup objects in RoadRoller all powerups need to implement this inteface.

Author:
Felix

Method Summary
 void applyPowers()
          call this to apply the powerups effects.
 boolean isActive()
          tells is the powerup is currently set active.
 int timeLeftToLive()
          returns the remaining active time.
 void undoPowers()
          contrary to applyPowers().
 
Methods inherited from interface roadroller.gameobject.GameObject
getSprite, update
